description: An adaptive momentum strategy using MAMA/FAMA, KAMA, CTI, Williams %R, and RSI indicators for precise entry timing in trending markets.
author: @jilv220

populate_indicators.description: Calculate adaptive moving averages and momentum oscillators
populate_indicators.pseudocode:
1. Calculate HL2 (high+low)/2
2. Calculate MAMA/FAMA with fast/slow limits
3. Calculate MAMA difference ratio
4. Calculate KAMA with period 84
5. Calculate CTI with period 20
6. Calculate Williams %R with period 14
7. Calculate RSI with periods 84 and 112

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: pandas DataFrame with columns: open, high, low, close, volume

populate_indicators.output_description: DataFrame with adaptive indicators: mama, fama, mama_diff, kama, cti, r_14, rsi_84, rsi_112
populate_indicators.logic_explanation: Uses adaptive moving averages (MAMA/FAMA) that adjust to market volatility, combined with momentum oscillators for precise timing.

populate_buy_trend.description: Generate buy signals using multiple adaptive indicators with trend and momentum confirmation
populate_buy_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check KAMA > FAMA (trend confirmation)
2. Check FAMA > MAMA * 0.981 (adaptive trend)
3. Check Williams %R < -61.3 (oversold)
4. Check MAMA difference < -0.025
5. Check CTI < -0.715 (momentum)
6. Check recent high conditions for pullback
7. Check RSI conditions < 60
8. If all conditions true, set buy = 1
populate_buy_trend.output_description: DataFrame with buy column indicating buy signals (1 = buy, 0 = no action)
populate_buy_trend.logic_explanation: Complex multi-factor model that looks for oversold conditions in trending markets with adaptive trend confirmation and momentum divergence.

populate_sell_trend.description: No sell signals generated - relies on ROI and stoploss
populate_sell_trend.pseudocode: Empty condition - no active sell signals
populate_sell_trend.logic_explanation: Strategy relies on ROI targets and stoploss for exits rather than technical sell signals.

indicators.name: CTI

indicators.name: RSI

buy_conditions.description: Adaptive trend confirmation with oversold momentum
buy_conditions.logic: KAMA > FAMA AND FAMA > MAMA*0.981 AND Williams%R < -61.3 AND MAMA_diff < -0.025 AND CTI < -0.715

sell_conditions.description: No active sell conditions - relies on ROI/stoploss
